definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The painter bequeathed his collection of art treasures to a museum.
sentences.chinese: 这位画家把他收藏的美术珍品遗赠给一个博物馆。

sentences.english: The practice is a picture of the tang dynasty beaten ZhangXuan painter works.
sentences.chinese: 《捣练图》是唐代画家张萱之作。

sentences.english: The main concern is, whether those cartoonists are able to carry on their carrers as artists, just as they have been before?
sentences.chinese: 漫画家能否再像以前一样，作为艺术家而生存？

sentences.english: In the process of artists exploring the technique to deeply expressing the natures outlook and spirit, texturing method was born.
sentences.chinese: 皴法的产生是画家深入表现大自然的形质的探索结果。

sentences.english: The painter depicted Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 画家描绘了滑铁卢战役中的拿破仑。

sentences.english: Huayan is a very famous artist with good reputation in the Chinese painting history.
sentences.chinese: 华嵒是中国绘画史上享有较高声誉的一位画家。

sentences.english: Chinese artists believe that calligraphy and painting share one common source.
sentences.chinese: 国画家们相信书法和绘画是相通的。

sentences.english: Zeng Fanzhi is undoubtedly one of the most important Chinese contemporary artists to date.
sentences.chinese: 曾梵志无疑是中国当代最重量级的画家之一。

sentences.english: The artist sketched in a few trees to show a vividness in its surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 画家粗略地添加了几棵树，使画面环境颇显生动。

sentences.english: Such personages, I think, would please nobody but the painter that made them.
sentences.chinese: 窃以为此等画像除画家本人外，恐无人喜爱也。

sentences.english: He's a very good artist, at any rate for someone who is colour-blind.
sentences.chinese: 他是个不错的画家，至少色盲的人是这样认为的。

sentences.english: Mount Tai has long been the preferred gathering place for artists and poets.
sentences.chinese: 泰山历来是画家骚客所钟情的聚集地。

sentences.english: The painter swept a brush over his canvas.
sentences.chinese: 画家的画笔在画布上飞掠。

sentences.english: The old lady has practised a lot at drawing and she is now a famous painter.
sentences.chinese: 这位老妇人刻苦练习绘画，她现在是一名著名画家了。

sentences.english: Painters were hired to try and blend the huge, obtrusive towers into the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 受雇的画家尝试着将突兀的巨塔融入周围的风景之中。

definition: freehand drawing or painting in traditional Chinese style
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
